00011 // basic lua code interpreted from http://csl.sublevel3.org/lua/
00012 
00013 int myFunt (lua_State *L){
00014    int argc = lua_gettop(L);
00015 
00016    std::cout << "$$ ";
00017 
00018    for(int i=1;i<=argc;++i){
00019       std::cout << lua_tostring(L, i);
00020    }
00021    std::cout << "\n";
00022    return 1;
00023 }
00024 
00025 void report_errors(lua_State *L, int status)
00026 {
00027   if ( status!=0 ) {
00028     DOUT << "-- " << lua_tostring(L, -1) << "\n";
00029     lua_pop(L, 1); // remove error message
00030   }
00031 }

00036   //------------------------------------------------ ScriptManager::ScriptManager
00037   ScriptManager::ScriptManager()
00038   {
00039     // initilise the lua script interpreter
00040     DOUT << "initialising lua\n";
00041     m_luaState = lua_open();
00042     luaL_openlibs(m_luaState);
00043 
00044     lua_register(m_luaState, "ch_print", myFunt);
00045

00047     /*int s = */luaL_dostring(m_luaState, "\
00048        io.write = ch_print \
00049        print = ch_print \
00050        print \"attempted to bind ch_print to io.write and print\"");
00051 
00052     //DOUT << "-- " << lua_tostring(m_luaState, -1) << "\n";

00055   }

00057   //------------------------------------------------ ScriptManager::~ScriptManager
00058   ScriptManager::~ScriptManager()
00059   {
